name: ckb-simple-account-layer-js
description: JS bindings for rust ckb-simple-account-layer crate
author: hupeng <bitrocks.hu@gmail.com>

scripts.fmt: prettier --write "{lib,scripts,tests}/**/*.js" index.d.ts && cd native && cargo fmt --all --
scripts.package: npm run build-release && rm -rf native/target && node-pre-gyp package
scripts.package-for-electron: node scripts/build_for_electron.js && rm -rf native/target && node scripts/package_for_electron.js
